author: David1971
title: A lovely set
review: I got this set for my baby son. Okay, at three months old he might not fully appreciate it yet, but it's a gorgeous little set, this one. You get just enough bricks to raise up the baby so she can nuzzle her mother's face - lovely! And a couple of flowers. And the egg clicks closed/open very nicely. Both dinosaurs are very cute. Brilliant! Inevitably I now have to get the larger Dino Valley set (5598) immediately...
